nodes.text: The Morvogodine stormtrooper training facility was a stormtrooper training facility located on Morvogodine, headed by the infamous stormtrooper commander Kayn Somos. The facility was notorious for being extremely vicious, even by stormtrooper training facility standards. Often, its students are sent by Somos on "peacekeeping" missions as a final test of whether they had the means of becoming part of the Stormtrooper Corps.
